quote: You matter.
author: Suzanne Young,  The Treatment

quote: Imagine others complexly.
author: John Green,  Paper Towns

quote: Sometimes dead is better
author: Stephen King,  Pet Sematary

quote: I generally find subtlety a waste of time.
author: Cindy Gerard,  To the Brink

quote: Things work out the way they're meant to
author: Danielle Steel,  No Greater Love

quote: Fake sUCKs!
author: Toba Beta

quote: Ordinary life is pretty complex stuff.
author: Harvey Pekar

quote: Opposition is true friendship.
author: William Blake

quote: Every negative...Has a positive side...
author: Nelson M. Lubao

quote: The obvious can sometimes be illuminating when perceived in an unhabitual way.
author: Daniel Quinn,  Ishmael: An Adventure of the Mind and Spirit

quote: Totally present in this moment for you.
author: Truth Devour,  Unrequited

quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Every negative...Jas a positive side...
author: Nelson M. Lubao

quote: Sometimes life happens.
author: Katie McGarry,  Pushing the Limits

quote: Just because you can doesn't mean you should.
author: Sherrilyn Kenyon

quote: some moments are nice, some arenicer, some are even worthwritingabout.
author: Charles Bukowski,  War All the Time

quote: Life had sure been simpler when I hadn't dated.
author: Charlaine Harris,  Dead Until Dark

quote: It's kind of fun to do the impossible.
author: Walt Disney Company

quote: It's easier to fake it. When you fake it for sixteen years, it becomes part of you, something you don't think about.
author: Alex Flinn,  Breathing Underwater

quote: Do ordinary things extraordinarily well.
author: Gregg Harris

quote: Never assume the obvious is true.
author: William Safire

quote: if you want it really, you get it !!!
author: Ravinder Singh

quote: Life is much more successfully looked at from a single window.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald,  The Great Gatsby

quote: Sometimes, as we're stumbling along in the dark, we hit something good.
author: Susan Ee,  Angelfall

quote: I'm usually just enjoying life.
author: Alan Jackson

quote: People, generally, suck.
author: Christopher Moore,  The Stupidest Angel: A Heartwarming Tale of Christmas Terror

quote: Life is just a journey.
author: Princess Diana

quote: Nothing is real.
author: John Lennon,  Beatles Lyrics

quote: A thing worth having is a thing worth cheating for.
author: W.C. Fields

quote: When everything gets answered, it's fake.
author: Sean Penn

quote: One always has a choice.
author: Dona Wording

quote: In football everything is complicated by the presence of the opposite team.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: One's real life is so often the life that one does not lead.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: It's nice to have things to look forward to.
author: Stephen Chbosky,  The Perks of Being a Wallflower

quote: Fake it 'till you make it.
author: Gayle Forman,  If I Stay

quote: When you choose one way out of many, all the ways you don't take are snuffed out like candles, as if they'd never existed.
author: Philip Pullman,  The Amber Spyglass

quote: For you, a thousand times over
author: Khaled Hosseini,  The Kite Runner

quote: Its a bit mad. Too bad, I mean, that getting to know each just for a fleeting second Must be replaced by unperfect knowledge of the featureless wholeLike some pocket history of the world, so generalAs to constitute a sob or wail
author: John Ashbery,  Self-Portrait in a Convex Mirror

quote: You’re just another story I can’t tell anymore.
author: pleasefindthis,  I Wrote This For You

quote: A real relationship is two-way.
author: Sophie Kinsella,  Can You Keep a Secret?

quote: Sometimes I think my whole life has been about holding on to you.
author: Jodi Picoult,  Vanishing Acts

quote: If you obey all of the rules, you miss all of the fun.
author: Katharine Hepburn

quote: Life is a winking light in the darkness.
author: Hayao Miyazaki

quote: This moment will just be another story someday.
author: Stephen Chbosky,  The Perks of Being a Wallflower

quote: Never miss a good chance to shut up.
author: Will Rogers

quote: If I'd observed all the rules I'd never have got anywhere.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Always have something to look forward to
author: Vici Howard

quote: There is some good in this world, and it's worth fighting for.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien,  The Two Towers

quote: Everyone's a little crazy. Some people just hide it better than others.
author: Michelle Hodkin,  The Retribution of Mara Dyer

quote: All knowledge hurts.
author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Bones
